g:HTMLPanel.p: This is an example of a presenter-local dialog PresenterWidget.
Try clicking tabs and navigating while the dialog is showing should disappear and reappear when you come back.
Compare this to the behavior of the global dialog box you get by clicking on the "Launch global dialog" button.

You could make this a modal dialog if desired. However, the mechanism described above ensures that your app is robust even when the user navigates with the browser arrows or by manually modifying the URL.
